programme.desc: Rockwell warns the Turtles that Don Vizioso plans to wipe out all the mutants in New York - but he is too late to save Raph and Donnie from being captured by the gangster.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: The Championship
programme.desc: George Riley and Lynsey Hipgrave introduce highlights from the weekend's games in the Championship, including Barnsley v Sheffield Wednesday at Oakwell and Newcastle United v Wigan Athletic at St James' Park. Plus, the best of the action from Reading v Leeds United at the Madejski Stadium and Huddersfield Town v Burton Albion at the John Smith's Stadium.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: Goal Rush
programme.desc: George Riley and Lynsey Hipgrave introduce all the goals from the latest games in Leagues One and Two, including Bolton Wanderers v Chesterfield and Grimsby Town v Doncaster Rovers.(n)

programme.title: The Gadget Show
programme.desc: Craig Charles puts some state-of-the-art headphones to the test. These wireless units incorporate a voice-controlled smart assistant and a fitness tracker, all for £99. Jon Bentley dials up Chinese smartphone the Huawei Honor 6X to see if it is actually better than its more established rivals - and at a fraction of current prices. Plus, Georgie Barrat gets exclusive access to the New York Toy Fair, to check out latest tech playthings that will hit the shops in a few months' time.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jim is on the trail of a speeding motorcyclist, Jon reveals his guilty pleasure when he retrieves a stolen caravan and dog handler Barry is brought to book by a would-be lawyer. Meanwhile, Sarah deals with the aftermath of a drunken brawl between two brothers.(n)

programme.title: Operation: Daybreak
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about the assassination of leading Nazi Reinhard Heydrich and the subsequent search for the British-trained Czech patriots who killed him. As German forces scoured the countryside, the apparently insignificant village of Lidice came to bear the brunt of their rage. Starring Timothy Bottoms, Martin Shaw, Joss Ackland, Nicola Pagett, Anton Diffring and Anthony Andrews. Edited for language and violence.(n)

programme.title: The Four Feathers
programme.desc: A crisis of conscience prompts an officer to resign from the military, earning him the disdain of his friends and peers - so in an attempt to win back their respect, he embarks on a perilous undercover mission in the Sudan. Historical adventure based on the classic tale by AEW Mason, starring Heath Ledger, Wes Bentley, Kate Hudson and Djimon Hounsou. Includes 5 News Update at 4.50pm.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Inside
programme.desc: Documentary examining the history of famous buildings, beginning by going behind the scenes of the royal residence, which is presently the official London residence of, among others, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, and Prince Harry. The palace is also where Queen Victoria was born and raised, and was converted into a heavy artillery base during the Second World War, when it also saw a German POW camp established in the grounds.(n)

programme.title: Inside Buckingham Palace
programme.desc: Although it is closed and secretive, Buckingham Palace has become a symbol of everything British, despite only being a royal palace for less that 200 years. This second of two programmes reflects on previous monarchs' accomplishments during their reign, from Edward VII's commitment in 1901 to making the palace a royal stage, to George V's decision to change the family name from Saxe-Coburg-Gotha to Windsor. Finally, the programme considers the next King, who could bring about another revolution at the palace and change its role further in the future.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Disobedient Dogs Make You Laugh Out Loud.
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos featuring rebellious dogs doing bizarre and humorous things.(n)

programme.title: The Michael McIntyre Story
programme.desc: Documentary about the comedian's rise to fame, examining the influence of his fellow comedian father on his early routines before his eventual breakthrough performance at the 2006 Royal Variety show. The programme also explores how he has been involved in series that have reinvented stand-up comedy on TV, including Live at the Apollo and Comedy Roadshow.(n)

programme.title: 20 Moments
programme.desc: The countdown of memorable moments from the comedy scene draws to a close, with examples from both sides of the Atlantic. Highlighted are the launches of the raucous 1980s student sitcom The Young Ones and the satirical puppet show Spitting Image, the controversy surrounding Monty Python's Life of Brian, and the much deplored `Sachsgate' scandal of 2008, which saw the tide of public opinion turn against popular BBC presenters Russell Brand and Jonathan Ross after they played an ill-conceived prank on Fawlty Towers star Andrew Sachs live on air on Radio 2. The show also highlights more poignant moments, including Joan Rivers' trail-blazing debut on The Tonight Show back in 1965, and Tommy Cooper's death while live on stage in 1985. Featuring David Baddiel, Keith Allen, Jim Davidson, Jenny Eclair and Nina Wadia.(n)

programme.title: Football League Tonight
programme.sub-title: Football League Tonight: The Checkatrade Trophy: Coventry City v Oxford United.
programme.desc: Coventry City v Oxford United. Extended highlights of the Checkatrade Trophy final from Wembley Stadium, where the League One sides faced each other. The Sky Blues are rooted to the bottom of the table and look like certainties for relegation, so this game was a good distraction for their beleaguered fans. The U's still harbour a hope of reaching the play-offs at the end of the season, and manager Michael Appleton will have been keen to lift this trophy having reached the same stage last season, losing 3-2 to Barnsley.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors: Takedown with Vinnie Jones
programme.desc: The actor gets a crash course in control and restraint techniques from Dragoon officer Derek Longstaff and sees first-hand how these tactics are used in the field when officers deal with a prisoner who refuses to go quietly.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.sub-title: Yorkshire: A Year in the Wild: Summer.
programme.desc: Unseasonably cold summer weather causes difficulties for several animals in the Yorkshire Dales and North York Moors, including an injured roe deer and her twins. High up in Malham Cove, two 40-day-old peregrines must learn how to fly, while south of the North York Moors National Park, a pair of grebes carry their youngsters around on their backs.(n)

programme.title: Caught on Camera
programme.sub-title: Criminals: Caught on Camera: Street Crime UK.
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces across the UK to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to fight the huge rise in street crime. In London, the Met's robbery squads work the streets on a busy Friday night, and with criminals now using motorbikes to get away, cameras help officers identify, track and apprehend offenders. Nick also finds out how pickpockets, scammers and bag thieves use sleight of hand and distraction to relieve people of their valuables.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property expert Ann Maurice offers advice on selling a property in West Dulwich, south London. The owner, a single mother-of-three, feels it is time to move on and wants to be closer to her children's school, but cannot find a buyer for her Victorian house.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Angels of Jarm
programme.desc: Angel Rafe arrives to help teach Wendy that sometimes things happen for a reason.(n)

programme.title: Roary the Racing Car
programme.desc: Big Chris tests a new gadget that will help monitor the cars.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.desc: Pip and Alba sort through a pile of stuff for Skipper, but there is a mix-up between the things they are keeping, and those that are going to be recycled.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Lily and Salty find a baby whale caught in a nylon fishing net. After they free him, he shows his gratitude in an amazing way.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The youngster decides to take over Maid's responsibilities on her day off.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot-air balloon, so Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue in a bid to save her and win the race.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The handyman and his hard-working pals have a host of adventures as they restore the town of Fixham to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Pontypandy is flooded by a high tide and Norman goes out in a boat to save Woolly and her lamb.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Small purple engine Charlie spots an elephant on the line, but when he goes to alert the others no one believes him because he is always telling jokes.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: A lesson in how to feed seabirds.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Nazboo gets sick with the dragon pox, so Leah, Shimmer and Shine set out on an adventure to find the magical cure.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Broken Crystal Memory Game.
programme.desc: The DareDale Challenge obstacle race is about to start when it is discovered that the crystal memory game is broken. While Clockwork Mouse sets about mending it, Noddy and Revs try to find out who was responsible.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Mr Porter's van full of puppy food begins to slide on the ice near the shore, leaving Ryder and the team to work together to get it to safety.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The Wise Old Elf teaches the children to tell the time, and takes Ben and Holly to see the big clock at the top of Elf Tree.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: All of his friends have won the Great Soapbox Race before, but Digby has only ever come second and this year he is determined to win - but so is Grizel.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George learns about dinosaurs on a trip to a museum, while Peppa takes an interest in kings and queens.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George and Peppa want to cool down on a hot day, so they go swimming.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: When one of the young monkeys is stuck on a log floating in the river, Wissper calls on Herbert the shire horse for help.(n)

programme.title: Toot the Tiny Tugboat
programme.desc: Toot and Marge the barge think they are being chased by a pirate ship - until Toot realises it is just a party ship that has lost its way.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Journalist and broadcaster Matthew Wright is joined by a panel of guests and the studio audience to debate the issues of the day.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Jas Deooray turns her attention to Samantha, a 24-year-old carer who has been looking after her mother since she was 16, but is now racked with anxiety, self-doubt and depression. Dr Iyer treats Louise, a 91-year-old who worries her prolapsed uterus might mean she is unable to fly to Canada to see her sister. Meanwhile, Nurse Swinburne tries to get a patient with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease to stop smoking cigarettes and weed. She recommends a course to help him combat his addictions, but he proves reluctant to comply when he discovers each session lasts four hours.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The officers chase a debt of almost £2,000 in unpaid parking fines, and later encounter the extraordinary case of a debt of £80,000 owed by a hotel owner to his ex-girlfriend. However, as they begin to search the property, they call upon police back-up as the agents fear the debtor may have access to firearms. Elsewhere, two officers head to a car garage in Manchester where the owner owes £2,000 after losing a court case over a faulty vehicle.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Sun-kissed Australian soap charting the latest comings and goings of the Summer Bay regulars.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie is desperate to get in touch with Sonya, but Mark holds him responsible for her stress and the marriage seems in tatters. Jack begs Paige to reconsider leaving Erinsborough.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team investigate when naval cryptanalyst Andrew Wells is shot dead in a park outside Baltimore. At the scene, Tony spots a man who was one of his informants from 15 years earlier when he was a police officer, but who went into hiding after a bid to bring down the Russian mobsters he worked for went wrong. Drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Nurse
programme.desc: A young man is injured in a car accident, so he and his girlfriend hire a nurse to look after him. But it soon becomes clear to the happy couple that their supposed carer is actually a troubled woman who is out to destroy their lives. Thriller, starring Sarah Butler, Steven Good and Lindsay Hartley.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie is desperate to get in touch with Sonya, but Mark holds him responsible for her stress and the marriage seems in tatters. Jack begs Paige to reconsider leaving Erinsborough.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Sun-kissed Australian soap charting the latest comings and goings of the Summer Bay regulars.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Lost at Sea: Air France 447
programme.desc: In June 2009, a state-of-the-art Air France Airbus A330 passenger jet flying from Rio de Janeiro to Paris vanished over the Atlantic Ocean. Based on official reports and eyewitness accounts, and with the aid of dramatic reconstructions and cutting-edge CGI, this documentary charts the attempts to find the plane, recover the flight recorders and discover the cause of the crash, which killed all 228 people on board.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Gordon Morris leads a raid on the house of a suspected drug user, but the door won't budge. Meanwhile, Rich Woodward is in pursuit of a souped-up hot hatch, a late-night reveller kicks off in Nantwich town centre, and police dog Bonnie is used in the hunt for two runaways.(n)

programme.title: Inside the Tube: Going Underground
programme.sub-title: The World's First Deep Tube Line.
programme.desc: New series. Engineer and urban explorer Rob Bell examines the hidden story of how the world's oldest underground railway was built. He begins by exploring the construction of what is known today as the Northern Line, which runs 36 miles through London and connects the boroughs north and south of the Thames.(n)

programme.title: All New Traffic Cops
programme.sub-title: All New Traffic Cops: Under Attack.
programme.desc: A high-speed chase in Bradford's crowded streets ends very suddenly and the driver claims he just wants to get home to eat his takeaway while it is still hot. But is that the whole story? In Harrogate, a volatile drink-driver's rapid mood swings prove a test for the cops, while a large stash of cannabis is found at the scene of a major collision, which has left one person with life-threatening injuries. A couple suspected of dealing drugs are chased down and taken to the station, where they provide the traffic team with contrasting reactions to being held in custody. Jamie Theakston presents.(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: An evil warlord kills a barbarian chieftain, whose son grows up to be a mighty warrior and seeks revenge for his father's death. He finds there is more at stake, as the tyrant is close to acquiring all the pieces of a magic mask, which will make him all-powerful. Fantasy adventure, with Jason Momoa, Stephen Lang, Ron Perlman and Rose McGowan.(n)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: A young couple are terrorized by three masked intruders at a secluded country house in this grimly efficient exercise in horror and suspense(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Samuel L Jackson plays the eponymous hero in John Singleton's tough thriller, an ex-cop who sets out to nail Walter Wade Jnr., a killer using his rich kid connections to escape conviction. But as Shaft's net draws tighter, he has to contend with killers employed by a desperate Wade(n)

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Mickey Rourke is a fading pro-wrestler struggling to adjust to life outside the ring in this Oscar-winning 2008 movie. Marisa Tomei co-stars(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Voyage
programme.desc: When a brilliant scientist is shot, only one way remains to save him: a submarine is shrunk to fit inside the man's bloodstream. But the internal world is as wild as the ocean and there's a saboteur on board(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Futuristic science fiction thriller, about a detective who works for a police department that uses three infallible psychics to help convict murderers before they have actually committed their crimes. When the detective discovers that he has been identified as a future killer, he becomes a fugitive from his own colleagues. Based on a short story by Philip K Dick. Starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton, Max von Sydow, Steve Harris, Neal McDonough(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: A mysterious wanderer looks for dry land after Earth is engulfed by water(n)

programme.title: Dragonfly
programme.desc: Kevin Costner gives a sensitive performance in this intriguing thriller about a doctor who tries to communicate with his dead spouse. After his wife dies while on a Red Cross mission, a man (Costner) is plagued by what he believes are messages from her, and tries to decipher what they mean. Kathy Bates, Joe Morton, Ron Rifkin, Linda Hunt, Susanna Thompson, Jacob Vargas(n)

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A disturbing videotape appears to hold the power of life and death over those who view it in this offbeat thriller. A strange videotape begins making the rounds in a town in the Pacific Northwest; it is full of bizarre and haunting images, and after watching it, many viewers receive a telephone call in which they are warned they will die in seven days. A handful of teenagers who watched the tape while spending a weekend at a cabin in the mountains scoff at the threat, but as predicted, they all die suddenly on the same night. Rachel Keller (Naomi Watts), the aunt of one of the ill-fated teens, is a journalist who has decided to investigate the matter and travels West with her young son, Aidan (David Dorfman), a troubled child who has been drawing pictures of strange and ominous visions. Rachel managed to find the cabin in the woods and watches the video herself; afterward, she receives the same phone call, and realizes she must solve the puzzle of the video and the person or persons behind it within a week. Rachel turns to her ex, Noah (Martin Henderson), an expert in video technology, who at first is convinced the story is a hoax until he digs deeper into the mystery. The Ring was adapted from a 1996 Japanese film by Hideo Nakata, which became a massive box-office success in Asia and spawned two sequels(n)

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: A hit man is forced to commit three difficult killings in order to rescue his kidnapped lover(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: A gripping drama based on the true story of the mission to rescue 33 miners who were trapped in a underground mine for 69 days(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: In this thrilling fourth installment of the "Jurassic Park" franchise, two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In the next installment of the "Maze Runner" franchise Thomas (Dylan O'Brien), Teresa (Kaya Scodelario) and the rest of the Gladers search for clues about WCKD, a powerful organization in the Scorch, a bleak landscape that is filled with dangerous obstacles. The Gladers partner with resistance fighters to take on WCKD in an attempt to discover their plans for the future in this young-adult dystopian thriller from 20th Century Fox. Directed by Wes Ball who previously directed the original film, The Maze Runner. Cast includes Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Giancarlo Esposito, Aidan Gillen, Ki Hong Lee, Barry Pepper, Lili Taylor and Patricia Clarkson(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Writer-director Paul WS Anderson tunes-up Roger Corman's 1975 cult vehicle "Death Race 2000" in this action flick about a contest pitting a convict against other convicts, with the winner walking off with his freedom(n)

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive
programme.desc: The Rhea-M comet starts revolving round earth and provokes all machinery to become their own masters and revolt against mankind. The Rhea-M comet starts revolving round earth and provokes all machinery to become their own masters and revolt against mankind. A group of people find shelter in a relay station and are surrounded by a horde of raging trucks. After a tremendous fight. Bill, Bubba, Brett and some others manage to reach the coast and set sail to an island void of technology(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: After a disastrous summer, Harry returns to begin his fifth year at Hogwarts, one of the toughest he will ever have. A few group of students and parents believe him or Dumbledore that Voldemort is really back, and a never-ending series of articles states that they are insane. On top of that, Dolores Umbridge, the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, proves to be the nastiest person Harry has ever encountered(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: Imported by the Army for an early a.m. radio show, Cronauer blasts the formerly staid, sanitized airwaves with a constant barrage of rapid-fire humor and the hottest hits from back home. The G.I.s love him but the brass is up in arms!(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: The creation of one of the most memorable books of the 1960s -- and the impact the writing and research would have on its author -- is explored in this drama based on a true story. In 1959, Truman Capote (played by Philip Seymour Hoffman) was a critically acclaimed novelist who had earned a small degree of celebrity for his work when he read a short newspaper item about a multiple murder in a small Kansas town. For some reason, the story fascinated Capote, and he asked William Shawn (Bob Balaban), his editor at The New Yorker, to let him write a piece about the case. Capote had long believed that in the right hands, a true story could be molded into a tale as compelling as any fiction, and he believed this event, in which the brutal and unimaginable was visited upon a community where it was least expected, could be just the right material. Capote traveled to Kansas with his close friend Harper Lee (Catherine Keener), herself becoming a major literary figure with the success of To Kill a Mockingbird, and while Capote's effete and mannered personal style stuck out like a sore thumb in Kansas, in time he gained the trust of Alvin Dewey (Chris Cooper), the Kansas Bureau of Investigation agent investigating the murder of the Clutter family, and with his help Capote's magazine piece grew into a full-length book. Capote also became familiar with the petty criminals who killed the Clutter family, Dick Hickock (Mark Pellegrino) and Perry Smith (Clifton Collins Jr.), and in Smith he found a troubling kindred spirit more like himself than he wanted to admit. After attaining a sort of friendship with Smith under the assumption that the man would be executed before the book was ever published, Capote finds himself forced to directly confront the moral implications of his actions with regards to both his role in the man's death, and the way that he would be remembered. Capote also co-stars Bruce Greenwood as Capote's longtime companion Jack Dunphy, and Amy Ryan as Mary Dewey, Alvin's wife who became a confidante of Capote's(n)

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: A Swedish man opts for a sex change and undergoes the world's first gender reassignment surgery, but his marriage suffers as his artist wife struggles with the transition(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Arnie's at his best as tough L.A. detective John Kimble who must find a drug lord's wife so she can testify in court. Problem is, she's gone into hiding to protect her son. With only the name of the kid's elementary school, Kimble must go undercover... As a kindergarten teacher! Academy Award winner Linda Hunt joins the cast with Academy Award nominee Cathy Moriarty in this great blend of action, thrills, and humor(n)

programme.title: I Spy
programme.desc: CIA agent Alex Scott is teamed with an unlikely partner for a secret mission in Budapest to recover a superplane: loud-mouthed boxing champ Kelly Robinson. Spy comedy(n)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Ice cool Jason Statham transports anything, no questions asked. However, one package could be his undoing in this crime thriller from writer Luc Besson. Contains violence(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Ted (voice of Seth MacFarlane) ties the knot with Tami-Lynn (Jessica Barth), and recruits his best friend John (Mark Wahlberg) as a sperm donor in order to start a family in this sequel to the comedy hit about a teddy bear come to life. Later, when the Commonwealth of Massachusetts demands that Ted appear before a judge to prove he's a real person, the frisky bear and his pal vow to fight for their civil rights. Morgan Freeman and Amanda Seyfried co-star(n)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: David Fincher's follow-up to Fight Club is a claustrophobic thriller starring Jodie Foster and Kirsten Stewart as a mother and daughter trapped in their new house's safe room by a gang of thieves. The housebreakers are a dynamic trio desperate to get their hands on millions of dollars' worth of bonds the previous owner left behind, and their arrival prompts divorcee Meg and 11-year-old Sarah to take refuge in the vault-like room of the title. Unfortunately for them, that's where the loot is concealed, and Fincher ramps up the tension with some exhilarating camera work as a deadly stand-off ensues(n)

programme.title: Species: The Awakening
programme.desc: Miranda, a beautiful college professor, awakens from a blackout and is surrounded by dead bodies. She learns she is an alien/ human hybrid, and must travel to Mexico to find her creator before she can no longer contain her lethal urges(n)

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: A young couple are terrorized by three masked intruders at a secluded country house in this grimly efficient exercise in horror and suspense(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Samuel L Jackson plays the eponymous hero in John Singleton's tough thriller, an ex-cop who sets out to nail Walter Wade Jnr., a killer using his rich kid connections to escape conviction. But as Shaft's net draws tighter, he has to contend with killers employed by a desperate Wade(n)

Capote had long believed that in the right hands, a true story could be molded into a tale as compelling as any fiction, and he believed this event, in which the brutal and unimaginable was visited upon a community where it was least expected, could be just the right material. Capote traveled to Kansas with his close friend Harper Lee (Catherine Keener), herself becoming a major literary figure with the success of To Kill a Mockingbird, and while Capote's effete and mannered personal style stuck out like a sore thumb in Kansas, in time he gained the trust of Alvin Dewey (Chris Cooper), the Kansas Bureau of Investigation agent investigating the murder of the Clutter family, and with his help Capote's magazine piece grew into a full-length book. Capote also became familiar with the petty criminals who killed the Clutter family, Dick Hickock (Mark Pellegrino) and Perry Smith (Clifton Collins Jr.), and in Smith he found a troubling kindred spirit more like himself than he wanted to admit. After attaining a sort of friendship with Smith under the assumption that the man would be executed before the book was ever published, Capote finds himself forced to directly confront the moral implications of his actions with regards to both his role in the man's death, and the way that he would be remembered. Capote also co-stars Bruce Greenwood as Capote's longtime companion Jack Dunphy, and Amy Ryan as Mary Dewey, Alvin's wife who became a confidante of Capote's(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond take charge of shooting a car chase for a film version of The Sweeney, assisting with the stunt-driving choreography and the direction of lead actors Ray Winstone and Ben Drew. James May takes the Vauxhall Corsa VXR Nurburgring for a run around the test track, and delivers his verdict on the updated Fiat Panda. Hollywood actor Ryan Reynolds is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are in Russia as the motoring magazine returns, taking part in a race across the urban landscape of St Petersburg. James defends the honour of the car in a very small Renault, Richard tries to prove that pedalling is faster by riding a bicycle, while Jeremy attempts to demonstrate that water is the quickest way across town by piloting a hovercraft. To make matters more complicated, all three presenters are racing not only one another but also the Stig, who is making his way toward the finish line by public transport. Plus, the new Lamborghini Huracan is put through its paces and singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran takes to the test track in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a project to build a car that can turn into a hovercraft and bring relief to flooded areas. Their efforts do not start smoothly, but it is not long before the trio are demonstrating the brilliance of their creation with an eventful journey down the River Avon. Plus, Jeremy grabs the keys to two variants of the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG supercar - the V8-engined Black Series with a roaring 622bhp, and the 740bhp Electric Drive, which is powered by four electric motors. X-Men and Les Miserables star Hugh Jackman is the latest celebrity to take the new Reasonably Priced Car around the test track.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond take charge of shooting a car chase for a film version of The Sweeney, assisting with the stunt-driving choreography and the direction of lead actors Ray Winstone and Ben Drew. James May takes the Vauxhall Corsa VXR Nurburgring for a run around the test track, and delivers his verdict on the updated Fiat Panda. Hollywood actor Ryan Reynolds is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are in Russia as the motoring magazine returns, taking part in a race across the urban landscape of St Petersburg. James defends the honour of the car in a very small Renault, Richard tries to prove that pedalling is faster by riding a bicycle, while Jeremy attempts to demonstrate that water is the quickest way across town by piloting a hovercraft. To make matters more complicated, all three presenters are racing not only one another but also the Stig, who is making his way toward the finish line by public transport. Plus, the new Lamborghini Huracan is put through its paces and singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran takes to the test track in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a project to build a car that can turn into a hovercraft and bring relief to flooded areas. Their efforts do not start smoothly, but it is not long before the trio are demonstrating the brilliance of their creation with an eventful journey down the River Avon. Plus, Jeremy grabs the keys to two variants of the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG supercar - the V8-engined Black Series with a roaring 622bhp, and the 740bhp Electric Drive, which is powered by four electric motors. X-Men and Les Miserables star Hugh Jackman is the latest celebrity to take the new Reasonably Priced Car around the test track.(n)

programme.title: Sin City Motors
programme.desc: Steve Darnell and the team build a train-themed rat rod. Railroads are a big part of US history, but it remains to be seen whether they can they keep the project on track.(n)

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: The wrestler challenges eight contestants to triumph over a series of gruelling physical endurance tests.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson tests the new BMW M4 at the track, before switching to the German manufacturer's hybrid-powered i8 for a trip up the A1 to Whitby, North Yorkshire, where he decides which of the two he would rather take for the drive home. With Land Rover production ceasing in the UK later this year, Richard Hammond pays tribute to the 4x4 by attempting to drive one straight up the side of a dam, while James May puts the Mercedes AMG GT through its paces. Taking to the test track in the Reasonably Priced Car are Will Smith and Margot Robbie.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May put three supercars through their paces in Italy. Their weapons of choice are the 691bhp Lamborghini Aventador, McLaren's hi-tech MP4-12C, and a British brute in the form of the Noble M600. The journey begins at Nardo, a high-speed testing ground so vast it can be seen from space, and includes a nerve-racking drive in Rome before reaching its conclusion with a timed challenge against the Stig at the Imola circuit. The trio are also joined by The Voice mentor Will.i am, who takes the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.sub-title: Scrappers - Back in the Yard: Many Happy Returns.
programme.desc: The documentary about straight-talking scrap yard owner Terry Walker and glamorous wife Lyndsay returns. Having had a difficult year due to financial difficulties and a serious accident, they hope her 50th birthday will be a new beginning. Now it is their last chance to get the yard running right so they can hand it on to the kids. Terry is trying to drum health and safety into the lads and has decided to lose a day's takings and put them in a training session on cutting tools.(n)

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.sub-title: Scrappers - Back in the Yard: You Can't Get the Staff.
programme.desc: Lyndsay is mad at Terry and with good reason too, as he has sacked their son.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the mid-engined Alfa Romeo 4C on the shores of Lake Como in Italy - but his enjoyment of the lightweight vehicle is disturbed by the arrival of Jeremy Clarkson, who demands a race against his quad bike. Jeremy also visits Belgium, putting the McLaren P1 hypercar to the test in Bruges and around the Spa-Francorchamps Formula One circuit - and its combined power output of more than 900bhp generated from electricity and turbocharged petrol V8 power is likely to cause astonishment. Meanwhile, James May spends time at Camp Bastion in Afghanistan to learn about the army's vehicle redeployment efforts, and Thor star Tom Hiddleston tries to coax the best time he can muster from the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: James May's Cars of the People
programme.desc: The former Top Gear presenter examines the social significance of cars in the 20th century. He begins by travelling to Germany, Italy and Russia to examine how dictators kick-started the mobilization of the masses, finding tales of design brilliance, abject failure, war, fraud and double dealing. James also learns about how the British motor industry blew a gift-wrapped chance to rule the world and he gets his own back with a stunt that means bad news for one of the planet's most hated cars.(n)

programme.desc: Adam goes to great lengths to dodge swimming classes, but his plan to avoid the sport could affect his friendship with Dave. Jealousy prompts Barry to undermine Erica when she attempts to make the world a better place by forming a school social awareness club.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray grows a moustache, but it ignites a feud between Beverly and Bill, while Barry is convinced that he's lost Lainey's affections. David Koechner guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny makes fun of Leonard's habit of collecting sci-fi memorabilia, so he decides to give it up - but his friends object and do everything possible to persuade him not to change his ways. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon's friends all fall for his sexy twin sister, who is paying him a visit, but he declares he will have the final say on who can date her - an announcement that particularly dismays Leonard. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Drama following the lives and loves of a group of teenagers and young adults in Chester.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben enlists Danny's help to find out more about who Tucker is dating, while Brad is arrested by the FBI as he prepares to leave on a trip around the world with Bonnie.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard try to distract Sheldon from his career woes by reinstating Anything Can Happen Thursday, but it causes friction among the gang when Amy and Bernadette are caught lying. Meanwhile, Raj seeks Howard's help in preparing for a date with Emily. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang's preparations for Star Wars Day are interrupted by the news that Professor Proton has died. Leonard and Penny attend the funeral, where they talk about their rejected marriage proposals, but Sheldon has difficulty dealing with the death of his childhood hero - until a surprise visitor helps him cope with his grief. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with a guest appearance by Bob Newhart.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Mimi rocks Olivia and Fredrik with news of a secret flirtation, while Louise's night out with Alex causes Ryan to worry that this old friend is a bad influence on his other half.(n)

programme.title: Empire
programme.desc: Cookie tries to move forward with Angelo while struggling with guilt over her run-in with Lucious, while Leah seeks Tariq's help to take down Anika, and Jamal and Tory team up.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is offered an exciting job opportunity, but it will mean he has to leave the country for several months. Penny tries to support his ambitions, while Sheldon is jealous and attempts to discourage him from accepting the post. Meanwhile, Raj pushes the boundaries with Lucy, but puts their relationship in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny bond as they miss Leonard, and Howard tries to help Raj get over his break-up with Lucy. Meanwhile, Bernadette and Amy visit an out-of-town conference. Comedy about four high-achieving scientists, starring Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Machine
programme.desc: A 2008 documentary in which Professor Brian Cox visits Geneva to look around Cern's Large Hadron Collider - the world's most powerful particle collider - before the apparatus goes live. He explains why some scientists believe the experiment will be able to recreate the conditions that existed a billionth of a second after the Big Bang, and reveal some of the mysteries of creation.(n)

programme.title: Unseen Universe
programme.desc: The first of a two-part documentary offering an insight into natural phenomena that can't always be seen with the naked eye. Scientists use state-of-the-art slow-motion cameras to explore what is really happening during an explosion, how dogs move and how different birds of prey fly.(n)

programme.title: Unseen Universe
programme.sub-title: In the Blink of an Eye.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Scientists use state-of-the-art slow-motion cameras to explore what is really happening when a bee hovers, a boxer punches and a small bird flies.(n)

programme.title: Unseen Universe
programme.desc: Part one of two. Slow-motion cameras capture what happens when a caterpillar metamorphoses into a butterfly and scrutinise the movements of acrobats in a circus.(n)

programme.title: Unseen Universe
programme.desc: Part two of two. The slow-motion cameras explore what is really happening in a cave full of bats, capture one of the fastest fish on Earth and scrutinise butterflies.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: How Many People Can Live on Planet Earth?.
programme.desc: David Attenborough investigates the consequences of human population growth - from 2.5 billion in 1950 to seven billion today - both on people and the environment. While most of this increase has come from developing countries, studies suggest western lifestyles take an unfair share of the planet's resources, as the naturalist argues that a change in the way we live and even smaller families might be needed if mankind is to survive on Earth.(n)

programme.desc: David Attenborough investigates the consequences of human population growth - from 2.5 billion in 1950 to seven billion today - both on people and the environment. While most of this increase has come from developing countries, studies suggest western lifestyles take an unfair share of the planet's resources, as the naturalist argues that a change in the way we live and even smaller families might be needed if mankind is to survive on Earth.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Machine
programme.desc: A 2008 documentary in which Professor Brian Cox visits Geneva to look around Cern's Large Hadron Collider - the world's most powerful particle collider - before the apparatus goes live. He explains why some scientists believe the experiment will be able to recreate the conditions that existed a billionth of a second after the Big Bang, and reveal some of the mysteries of creation.(n)

programme.title: Unseen Universe
programme.desc: The first of a two-part documentary offering an insight into natural phenomena that can't always be seen with the naked eye. Scientists use state-of-the-art slow-motion cameras to explore what is really happening during an explosion, how dogs move and how different birds of prey fly.(n)

programme.title: Unseen Universe
programme.sub-title: In the Blink of an Eye.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Scientists use state-of-the-art slow-motion cameras to explore what is really happening when a bee hovers, a boxer punches and a small bird flies.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: Documentary offering an insight into the lives and behaviour of the planet's fastest creatures.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Ocean Giants
programme.desc: Stephen Fry narrates this documentary exploring the vocal ranges of marine mammals. Sperm whales produce clicks to locate giant squid two miles beneath the ocean surface, and narwhals use a similar technique to find breathing holes in Arctic ice floes. Bottlenose dolphins communicate with fishermen in Brazil, humpbacks offer haunting operatic performances and boto dolphins create bat-like ultrasonic calls to help find fish in the murky Amazon River.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Amazing secrets of how rain is made - some raindrops form around micrometeorites from space, while others are created by bacteria floating into the upper atmosphere.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: The science of what happens when a tsunami emerges from open ocean and bears down on land, and forecasting where on earth the next mega-tsunamis are likely to strike.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Iain Stewart explains how geology, geography and climate have influenced humanity, discovering how four different planetary forces have shaped the history of the species. He begins by highlighting how active fault lines in the Earth's surface provided the key resources used by ancient civilisations to survive.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: The story of the invertebrates that left the sea to move on to land 400 million years ago. Since then, they have become the most successful group of animals, without which the land's ecosystem would collapse. David Attenborough examines the insects' behaviour, travelling to South Africa and Venezuela to witness the habits and routines of millipedes and centipedes.(n)

programme.title: Operation Wild
programme.desc: Broadcaster Clare Balding and vet Steve Leonard travel the world to watch vets perform innovative life-saving operations on a variety of wild animals. This first edition features a baby panda called Zhu Xia in south-west China that needs an MRI scan, and rescued gorilla Shufai in Cameroon, who was shot by poachers when he was a baby. Plus, a manta ray on the Japanese island of Okinawa that needs an ultra-sound scan to determine if it's pregnant, and a four-ton elephant in Laos with a gunshot wound.(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: After suffering a humiliating defeat at the hands of hungry young boxer Clubber Lang, Rocky is rejuvenated by his former rival Apollo Creed, who trains Rocky for a rematch against the fearsome mohawked rival, and helps him regain "the eye of the tiger."(n)

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: Rocky packs another punch in a bout against a Soviet named Drago(n)

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: Touted upon its release as the finale of the Rocky saga, this fifth entry in the long-running series of sports dramas reunites star Sylvester Stallone with John G. Avildsen, director of the Oscar-winning original. Stallone is Rocky Balboa, suffering from career-ending brain damage as a result of his punishing bout with Ivan Drago at the finale of the previous film. Upon their return to Philadelphia, Rocky and his wife, Adrian (Talia Shire), discover they are broke, their fortune squandered by an incompetent accountant. Forced to move back to their working-class neighborhood, Rocky finds that his only asset is the run-down gym willed to him by Mickey (Burgess Meredith, who appears in new flashback sequences). Resisting big money offered to him by Don King-like boxing promoter George Washington Duke (Richard Gant), Rocky becomes a trainer and finds a talented comer in Tommy Gunn (real-life boxer Tommy Morrison, nephew of John Wayne). Rocky's son (played by Stallone's real-life son Sage Stallone) feels neglected by his father, who lavishes attention on his protégé, but Tommy ultimately turns his back on his mentor to sign a more lucrative deal with Duke, leading to a street-fight showdown(n)

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Uplifting, Oscar-winning drama about a small-time boxer from Philadelphia who - against all odds - gets a shot at his ultimate dream, the heavyweight championship of the world(n)

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: Rocky packs another punch in a bout against a Soviet named Drago(n)

programme.title: Texas Rangers
programme.desc: The true story of the formation of the Texas Rangers provides the backdrop for this youth-oriented Western. In 1875, after the Civil War, Leander McNelly (Dylan McDermott) organizes the Texas Rangers to battle the outlaws terrorizing Texas, notably crime kingpin John King Fisher (Alfred Molina). With a team of experienced gunmen (Robert Patrick and Randy Travis) and enthusiastic but green recruits (James Van Der Beek, Usher Raymond, and Ashton Kutcher), McNelly and his Rangers bring law and order to the wild Texas plains; McNelly must also keep order among his charges when two rangers fall in love with the same woman, Caroline Dukes (Rachael Leigh Cook). Tom Skerritt and Vincent Spano are also featured in the supporting cast; the screenplay, adapted from a script by John Milius, was at one time set to be filmed by Sam Peckinpah, shortly before the legendary Western director's death in 1984(n)

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson Story
programme.desc: This documentary chronicles the life of Jackie Robinson, the first African American professional baseball player. Robinson's courage of conviction and the support of his family and friends enabled him to cross the color barrier in baseball, Robinson challenged his critics and the naysayers to accept him as he was: a man, an athlete, and a very talented baseball player. This bio-picture stars Jackie Robinson and features his story of working his way through the Negro Leagues and entering Major League Baseball. Jackie Robinson shined in his career and established himself as a role model for other athletes that followed. This motion picture also stars the very talented Ruby Dee as Nancy Robinson(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his love for Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the baseball team he supports, the Boston Red Sox. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch and released in America under that title, the two leads bring the same warmth and humour to their roles as their British counterparts. Even sports fans unfamiliar with baseball will know the pain that comes from attending an important function when your team are playing a crucial match(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Fact-based sports tale stars Dennis Quaid as Jim Morris, a high-school teacher and coach who makes it to the Major Leagues as a 35-year-old relief pitcher(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: A baseball legend almost finished with his distinguished career at the age of thirty-seven has one last chance to prove who he is, what he is capable of and win the heart of the woman he has loved for the past four years. As he pitches that night, he must decide whether to accept the trade or quit the game he loves, and between innings, he recalls meeting Jane, their first date, happy times, miscommunication, and what may be a final break. Meanwhile, with Vin Scully announcing, one Yankee batter after another fails to reach first base. Can Billy pitch a perfect game, and if so, what does it matter if he loses Jane?(n)

programme.title: The Natural
programme.desc: Robert Redford in the Bernard Malamud saga of a baseball player with magic in his bat(n)

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: The story of a minor-league North Carolina baseball team (the Triple A Durham Bulls) and its attentive, intelligent groupie who feels it is her mission to live with one young player per season and help him mature(n)

programme.title: The Scout
programme.desc: Yankees scout Al Percolo is banished to Mexico when his star pitcher fails in front of the biggest crowd of the season. But kooky thrower Steve Nebraska could take him back to the major league. Baseball laughs from the director of The Bad News Bears(n)

programme.title: Ed
programme.desc: A struggling minor-league pitcher forms a friendship with his team's newest star--a baseball-playing chimpanzee(n)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge(n)

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Fantasy about bickering brothers who are propelled into outer space by playing a mysterious board game. Based on the children's book by Chris Van Allsburg(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: A baseball legend almost finished with his distinguished career at the age of thirty-seven has one last chance to prove who he is, what he is capable of and win the heart of the woman he has loved for the past four years. programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Tired of being bullied at school and neglected at home, Jess Aarons and Leslie Burke escape into the woods, where Leslie opens Jess's mind to the amazing kingdom of Terabithia. It's a secret land where they reign supreme among the giants, ogres and other fantastical creatures they create(n)

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: When Libby Parsons goes sailing with her husband Nick, she's shocked to wake up covered in blood, with a gore-slicked knife beside her and no sign of her spouse. And when a Coastguard boat appears on the scene, things get even worse for her in director Bruce Beresford's revenge thriller. Libby is imprisoned for his murder on the circumstantial evidence - which also includes a massive death insurance payout - and her best friend, Angie, steps in to look after Libby's young son, Matty. But, speaking to Angie on the phone one day, Libby hears Matty say 'Hello Daddy... ' in the background and puts two and two together: she's been framed by her closest friends. Unfortunately for them, Libby discovers that once someone's been convicted of a crime, they can't be tried for it again. So she's got nothing to lose, and if she can get out of jail, she can make the pair pay the ultimate price for their treachery. Also starring Tommy Lee Jones(n)

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which an independent woman agrees to marry an older man - and then finds herself inexorably drawn to his misfit younger brother when her intended takes leave to visit his sick mother. A quirky blend of wit and romanticism that explores the tangled relationships and foibles that besiege a close-knit Italian-American family. Winner of three Oscars. Best Actress, Supporting Actress and Original Screenplay(n)

programme.title: Sorority Boys
programme.desc: If Mel Gibson had to get inside the mind of women to respect and understand them, in this teenage film the main characters will have to dress up as such to be able to do the same. Adam, Dave and Doofer are three college students who, after being thrown out of their brotherhood, find refuge in a neighboring sisterhood, made up of… feminists. To secure their space there they must dress up and keep a low profile. Until now, they had been cruel to girls, but this soon changes(n)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: In Love With the King. Historical drama about three women manoeuvring to become queen of England begins in 1463, as a secret wedding between a commoner and a royal leads to some regal intrigue(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: In the plot twisting high-tech thriller Face/Off relentless FBI agent Sean Archer must go dangerously undercover to investigate the location of a lethal biological weapon planted by his arch rival, the sadistic terrorist for hire Castor Troy. After undergoing a radical surgical procedure, Archer literally 'borrows' Troy's face and identity to carry out his mission. But things go awry when Troy emerging from a coma, transforms into Archer and wreaks havoc upon his life, both at work and at home. As the bomb continues to tick and the tension mounts, it becomes a high stakes game of cat and mouse as both Archer and Troy, ironically trapped in their enemy's body, try to save face...their own(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two middle-aged slackers become members of the same family when one's mother marries the other's father, and sparks soon start to fly between the contentious new step-siblings(n)

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
programme.desc: Thriller about a scientific expedition in Borneo, where giant snakes thrive in the jungle(n)

programme.title: Croc
programme.desc: A man-eating crocodile terrorizes a beach resort in Thailand. As a vengeful hunter stalks the malignant reptile, locals try to shut down a farm they claim is responsible for letting the beast out(n)

programme.title: Bats
programme.desc: Lou Diamond Phillips and Dina Meyer star in this campy horror flick. When bat attacks cause several deaths in a small Texas town, a scientist (Meyer) and the local sheriff (Phillips) join forces to stop the bats, which carry a lethal genetic virus. Bob Gunton, Leon, Carlos Jacott, David McConnell, Marcia Dangerfield(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: The legendary Greek myth gets the 80s treatment, with Hercules fighting off wizard Minos - who is trying to take over the world(n)

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: In this grisly and gripping horror tale, an American news crew gets more than it bargained for when it ventures to war-torn Burundi in search of a giant, killer crocodile. Dominic Purcell, Brooke Langton, Orlando Jones, Jurgen Prochnow. Directed by Michael Katleman(n)

programme.desc: After seeing dragons destroy the Earth, survivor Quinn joins up with slayer Van Zam to lead a small group into battle with the oldest, meanest fire breather of them all. Action(n)

programme.desc: An aging billionaire and a fashion photographer having an affair with the rich man's wife must struggle against the elements - including a man-eating bear - after their plane goes down in the Alaskan wild(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Humorist Dave Barry's comic novel is the basis for this frenetic romp, set in Miami. It's the story of a crazy group of people whose lives interconnect. Included: a Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist; a nasty industrialist; his put-upon wife; hit men; and a philosophical street person(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: Thriller set in 2047 about a missing spacecraft that turns up seven years after it disappeared, with the crew dead and a strange entity on board. A reconnaissance ship is despatched carrying a group of scientists, including the inventor of the spaceship's engine, a gravity drive motor named the Event Horizon. They soon discover a presence none of them could have expected(n)

programme.title: Northmen - A Viking Saga
programme.desc: After being banished from their homeland, a group of ruthless vikings are shipwrecked behind enemy lines. As a mercenary army bears down on them, it is a race against time to escape or be hunted down(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Witnesses to an assassination attempt against the president, including Secret Service agents Kent Taylor (Matthew Fox) and Thomas Barnes (Dennis Quaid), come away with sharply differing impressions of who did what to whom Barnes tries to piece together the shocking truth from the contradictory evidence and accounts. Sigourney Weaver, Forest Whitaker, William Hurt(n)

programme.title: Ghost Town Renegades
programme.desc: The Cheyenne Kid's out to stop a crook from cheating the owners of a gold mine. Lash La Rue, Al St. John, Jack Ingram, Jennifer Holt, William Fawcett(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Humorist Dave Barry's comic novel is the basis for this frenetic romp, set in Miami. It's the story of a crazy group of people whose lives interconnect. Included: a Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist; a nasty industrialist; his put-upon wife; hit men; and a philosophical street person(n)

programme.title: Gunmen
programme.desc: 400 million dollars are hidden in a boat in some harbor in South America. When Dani Sevigo's brother gets killed, Dani is a wanted man - by undercover DEA agent Cole Parker and Armor O'Malley, who is working for drug boss Loomis. Who finds the boat first?(n)

programme.title: Dead Heist
programme.desc: Filmmaker Bo Webb makes his feature directorial debut with this hybrid horror film that combines elements of a heist thriller and a zombie flick. When a group of crooks hatch a plot to rob a bank, they encounter something none of them had planned for. The crew suddenly finds themselves trapped inside the bank while a throng of blood-lusting zombies surrounds the building in search of mortal flesh. Released straight to DVD, Dead Heist stars old-school rapper Big Daddy Kane(n)

programme.title: The Grudge 2
programme.desc: Japanese horror specialist Takashi Shimizu returns to the mythology that terrified audiences the world over with this terror-inducing sequel to the hit 2004 frightener. When a cursed Tokyo home is burned to the ground, the baneful spirit once confined within its walls is suddenly unleased to terrorize anyone and everyone who crosses its dark path. Original producers Sam Raimi, Rob Tapert, and Taka Ichise return to help Shimizu realize his hair-raising vision with this tale that finds Karen's (Sarah Michelle Gellar) sister, Aubrey (Amber Tamblyn), teaming with spellbound journalist Eason (Edison Chen) to investigate the spectral mystery. Meanwhile, the ghostly grip of Toshio (Oga Tanaka) and Kayako (Takako Fuji) tightens on a Chicago housewife (Jennifer Beals) halfway across the globe(n)

programme.desc: In this tense police thriller, a Vietnam veteran and his henchman take three hostages and barricade themselves inside a refurbished hotel. programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers in Florida engage in an undercover operation against the sale of illegal pills at pain management clinics, while cops in Texas deal with a major traffic accident.(n)

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An Amarillo officer is forced to chase a woman on-foot after questioning her about her suspicious late-night behaviour. Meanwhile, a patrol in Florida deals with a brawl.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While transporting the corpse of Lt Gordon Roth to the morgue, a flat tyre brings Ducky and Jimmy to a halt and they are abducted and taken to a remote cabin - where one of their captors wants the post-mortem to take place. Back at the scene, Abby finds a blood sample that does not belong to the victim, who in fact bore little resemblance to the picture of Roth in his old school yearbook. Guest starring Valerie Cruz (The Following).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is stabbed to death after stepping out of her shower, becoming the latest victim of the Dead Rose Slasher. Gibbs is approached by his old friend and barber Frankie Dean, who shares his concern that his son Cameron may be the killer. He explains that a photo-fit released to the media resembles him, and the attacks stopped during a period coinciding with his three-year stint in the navy. Meanwhile, Tony has to take probationary agent Ned Dorneget under his wing.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Marine sergeant Teddy Lemere is killed by a sniper in Afghanistan just after his sniffer dog helps guide a young child out of a minefield. Back in the US, his widow Ruby tells Gibbs and the team that she had recently received a message from her husband saying he might have upset a few people. Abby retrieves a tiny shard of the sniper's bullet from Ted's helmet and finds that it was made in America.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A doctor dies on board the USS Borealis during a heavy storm and when the ship is brought into Norfolk Naval Yard, Ducky's investigation reveals a telltale mark on the victim's carotid artery, suggesting he was injected with poison. Initial inquiries focus on a petty officer with a history of drug use who may have wanted the doctor to remain silent about his problems. American drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team are called in when a Navy reservist returns home to find her husband missing and her living room covered in blood, and make a grim discovery when they find a finger in the bin. Meanwhile, Ziva ruffles a few feathers by insisting on continuing her investigation into the murder of her father, asking for permission to go to Rome on the trail of the chief suspect. Mark Harmon stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A wealthy 80-year-old man who recently married a young stripper is found dead and, when his widow dies of an overdose, all eyes turn to the butler. Despite a lack of support from her colleagues, Brenda decides to investigate the victim's three grown-up children instead.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda struggles to gain control of an investigation into the murder of a businessman and is eventually partnered on the case by Fritz. However, she discovers the FBI has ulterior motives, putting their friendship under further strain. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team members are forced to reopen a botched murder investigation from three years previously as they attempt to get a pyromaniac serial killer safely behind bars. Meanwhile, Taylor continues to wage his political war on Brenda's rank. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and Robert Gossett.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A complaint is filed against Brenda, which threatens her career in the squad, but when Captain Pope offers to help, she is dubious about his intentions. Meanwhile, the detectives are kept busy trying to trace the killer of a Hollywood producer. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The pressure is on for Brenda and her team to solve the murder of a police detective, but as evidence points to one of their own, the Deputy Police Chief struggles to match DNA samples that could prove their case. However, it becomes clear Gabriel and Daniels' relationship to the victim is key to understanding the crime. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs assumes a former alias to infiltrate an infamous anti-government militia. Meanwhile, Bishop and Reeves team up in an off-the-books investigation.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Palmer faces a dilemma during a hit-and-run investigation when he spots a stranger standing on a ledge, and places his own life in peril in an attempt to get the man down to safety.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The wife of a man who Danny helped to convict for manslaughter arrives at the TAC offices with a bomb, and takes the team hostage to force Bull to prove her husband's innocence.(n)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Some of Alexandria's residents embark on a journey to a distant community, and one member of the group faces a heartbreaking dilemma.(n)

programme.desc: Meg convinces Brian to take her SATs for her, but when she receives poor exam results everyone begins to question how smart the dog really is. Peter spends the day with the canine, showing him all the joys of being stupid, and the benefits of having a low IQ.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg is thrilled to be recruited as a model - but not everything is as it seems with the job. Meanwhile, Brian accompanies Stewie on a road trip adventure when the baby decides he wants to experience life outside of preschool.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and the gang interview potential friends to fill the vacancy left by Cleveland's departure, and Brian learns that Quagmire hates him - and only makes matters worse when he tries to find out why.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Nobody seems to care when Brian accidentally runs over and kills a fellow dog, so he tries to convince his friends that they should value canine lives as much as those of humans. Meanwhile, Lois hires a maid who does not listen to Peter.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan saves Roger's life, but the pair disagree over the chain of events leading to the rescue, resulting in the alien attempting to make a fresh start. Meanwhile, Steve becomes power-hungry when he is given the job of making announcements over the school's PA system.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan tries to prove he is the alpha male at the Smith house when Steve challenges him for family dominance, while Hayley and Jeff seek marriage counselling after their honeymoon period wears off.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Carter has a heart attack and lapses into a deep coma, so Peter takes over the running of his company Pewterschmidt Industries, but becomes power-mad and ends up firing every member of the board of directors.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter hits his head and develops total amnesia, leaving Lois facing the task of reacquainting him with his friends and family - not to mention such skills as driving and having sex.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian is hired by a magazine and decides to follow Meg for research, but discovers she has a secret boyfriend who has broken out of jail and is hiding in the Griffins' house. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein and Mila Kunis.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie and Chris go missing, prompting Lois to ask a psychic for help - but the family's obsession with the paranormal goes too far. Meanwhile, Chris develops a crush on a girl at school.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan begins playing golf with Senator Buckingham in a bid to advance in the CIA, but Roger accidentally sells the politician's daughter to a drug lord, which leaves Stan having to choose between his family and his career.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger bets Klaus that he can make Steve popular at school, but none of his plans seem to work - until the high school's in-crowd realise Steve can be their designated driver. Meanwhile, Stan and Francine play pranks on each other.(n)

programme.desc: Following Fiona's imprisonment, Michael is reeling from her loss, and Anson is on the run. If he doesn't want her sacrifice to have been in vain, he will have to stop the fugitive from disappearing for ever. Desperate to escape, Anson sends an assassin to Madeline's house and leaves a trail of bodies in his wake. Despite all the obstacles thrown in his way, Michael manages to corner him at a coastal industrial plant.(n)

The investigation leads back to a series of experiments performed on Reddick to discover the cause of his madness.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the discovery of a woman's body in the Bronx and learn she was reported missing 20 years previously. Suspicion falls on a businessman and his friend, but inquiries hit a dead end - until the team finds a link to two earlier rape cases with similarities to the murder.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A doctor dies on board the USS Borealis during a heavy storm and when the ship is brought into Norfolk Naval Yard, Ducky's investigation reveals a telltale mark on the victim's carotid artery, suggesting he was injected with poison. programme.desc: When a juror dies during the trial of a Mob boss, Brenda has her work cut out questioning the remainder of the jury, while an unannounced visit puts her plans with Fritz on hold. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates the murders of three college students, apparently caught in the middle of a gang shootout. Detective drama, with Kyra Sedgwick, Robert Gossett and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A Russian Mob leader's daughter is killed in what initially appears to be an act of gangland revenge against her father - until the focus of the investigation shifts to one of her classmates, who has an altogether more personal reason for wanting her dead. Drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A successful auditor appears to have killed his family and then himself, but an analysis of the crime scene suggests a different scenario. When Goren and Eames learn the dead man uncovered a pensions scandal involving retired cops, the trail leads to corruption within the force.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: New Mossad director Orli Elbaz asks for the team's help in finding Ilan Bodnar when one of her agents is shot dead in Virginia, telling Gibbs he was investigating several operatives who had gone rogue after Eli David's death. Ziva travels with Tony to Berlin in her pursuit of Bodnar, the man she believes was responsible for the death of her father. Guest starring Marina Sirtis (Star Trek: The Next Generation).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tracks Bodnar's SUV to a remote house in the countryside, but inside find only his dead accomplice - identified as a South African mercenary who helped Bodnar procure diamonds. programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: Set in 1953, Mona Lisa Smile tells the story of Katherine Watson (Julia Roberts), a new young art history professor at Wellesley College, an all-female campus with a prestigious reputation for academic excellence. Unfortunately for free-minded Berkeley grad Watson, her East Coast teaching stint comes during a less-progressive time that finds most of her students -- among them Betty Warren (Kirsten Dunst), Joan Brandwyn (Julia Stiles), and Giselle Levy (Maggie Gyllenhaal) -- more interested in nabbing a good husband than achieving scholastic and intellectual growth. Watson challenges her students and the Wellesley faculty to think outside of the current mores of the community and redefine what it means to be a success; meanwhile, she tries to come to terms with her own heart's desires. Mona Lisa Smile co-stars Marcia Gay Harden, Juliet Stevenson, and, as Watson's conflicting love interests, Dominic West and John Slattery(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer Badman. When the annual Candy Industry Trade Show comes to Springfield, noted sugar enthusiast Homer Simpson (voice of Dan Castellaneta) arrives to load up on free samples, with his embarrassed wife, Marge (voice of Julie Kavner), in tow. Homer's feeble willpower is quickly stretched to the breaking point, and he swipes the rarest item at the show -- a gummy Venus de Milo, "carved by gummy artisans who work exclusively in the medium of gummy." After arriving home from the show, Marge asks Homer to give the babysitter, feminist-minded college student Ashley Grant (voice of Pamela Hayden), a ride home. As Ashley is getting out of the car, Homer notices the precious gummy Venus de Milo is stuck to her bottom, and he quickly peels it off; Ashley is certain Homer was making a sexual advance, and accuses him of harassment. As Ashley and a group of protesters set up camp on the Simpsons' front lawn, a tabloid TV reporter interviews Homer, and through the magic of editing makes him sound like a subnormal degenerate, so suddenly Homer is the pariah of the community. "Homer Badman" also features the voice of Dennis Franz, who stars in a quickie TV movie modeled after Homer's notoriety, "Homer S.: Portrait of an Ass-Grabber." The episode first aired on November 24, 1994(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
